name: Matthias Tichy
content: About Me | Prof. Dr. Matthias Tichy Prof. Dr. Matthias Tichy I am a professor and head of the Institute of Software Engineering and Programming Languages at Ulm University, Germany. Most of my work centers around domain specific languages, model driven software engineering, empirical research, and cyber-physical systems with a special focus on self-adaption, evolution, and system dependability. Short CV since 08/2015, Full Professor, Institute of Software Engineering and Programming Languages, University of Ulm, Germany 05/2015 - 07/2015, Associate Professor, Software Engineering Group, Chalmers University of Technology and University of Gothenburg, Sweden 02/2012 - 04/2015, Assistant Professor, Software Engineering Group, Chalmers University of Technology and University of Gothenburg, Sweden 10/2010 - 09/2011, Acting Professor for Organic Computing, University of Augsburg, Germany 06/2009 - 01/2012, Postdoctoral researcher, Software Engineering Group, University of Paderborn, Germany 02/2009 - 05/2009, Software Developer, dSPACE GmbH, Paderborn, Germany 08/2002 - 01/2009, PhD student, University of Paderborn, Germany Contact e-mail: matthias.tichy@uni-ulm.de Room 419, building O27, 4th floor Mail: Institut fÃ¼r Softwaretechnik und Programmiersprachen, UniversitÃ¤t Ulm, D-89069 Ulm
